trans-unit.source: Represents data returned from calling the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerLayer.AdornerHitTest*> method.
trans-unit.target: 表示从调用返回的数据<xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerLayer.AdornerHitTest*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerLayer.AdornerHitTest*>

trans-unit.source: In addition to the visual and point information provided by the base class <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestResult>, this class uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.AdornerHitTestResult.Adorner%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to return the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner> that was hit (since there may be multiple Visuals in a single <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner>).
trans-unit.target: 在添加到视觉对象和基的类提供的点信息<xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestResult>，此类使用的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.AdornerHitTestResult.Adorner%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性以返回<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner>已命中 (因为可能有多个视觉对象在单个<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner>)。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner> </xref:System.Windows.Media.AdornerHitTestResult.Adorner%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestResult>

trans-unit.source: Gets the visual that was hit.
There may be multiple visuals in a single <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner>.
trans-unit.target: 在单个<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner>可能有多个视觉对象

trans-unit.source: This property returns the visual that was actually hit.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回实际命中的视觉对象。
